messages.subject: on the subject of parentings sacrificing their time, energy etc (themselves? LOL)
messages.msgSnippet: Instead of the word sacrifice , what if we used the word compromise , when it comes to parenting? Like many parents I try to negotiate outcomes with my
messages.messageBody:
Instead of the word "sacrifice", what if we used the word "compromise", when it comes to parenting? Like many parents I try to negotiate outcomes with my children and that usually means give and take from all parties. This way I avoid feeling that I have sacrificed myself in any way.

wishing you peace and prosperity,
Beverley Paine

http://homeschoolaustralia.beverleypaine.com and
